actions.Bite: Melee Weapon Attack: +6+1d4 + 4 to hit, reach 10 ft., one creature. Hit: 11 (2d6 + 4) piercing damage.
actions.Constrict: Melee Weapon Attack: +6+1d4 + 4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. Hit: 13 (2d8 + 4) bludgeoning damage, and the target is grappled (escape DC 16+1d4 + 14). Until this grapple ends, the creature is restrained, and the snake can't constrict another target.
